tool.name: Preprocessing Macro for rNMR-1D
tool.description: Generic preprocessing RAW NMR data with macro-commands.
tool.command: echo "#%% " Vendor=$vendor";" Type=$fid";" LB=$lb";" ZF=$zf";" PHC1=$phc1";" FP=$fp";" ZNEG=$zneg";" TSP=$tsp";" > $macro_out;

param.name: vendor
param.label: Choose the type of data, Vendor or nmrML
param.help: Type of data nmrML or Vendor.

param.name: fid
param.label: data type
param.help: data type for processing e.g. fid

param.name: lb
param.label: line broadening (default 0.3)
param.help: line broadening choose a value between 0.1 to 0.5

param.name: zf
param.label: zero filling (default 4)
param.help: zero filling by doubling number of points

param.name: tsp
param.label: TSP, reference in ppm compound (default TRUE)
param.help: Choose a chemical shift reference type, e.g. TSP

tool.help: Rnmr1D allows users to run the macro-command sequence used within NMRProcFlow. This module will allow you to edit macro-command sequence.
